Detailed Description

template<class T, class TRI, class L, class A>
class boost::numeric::ublas::triangular_matrix< T, TRI, L, A >

For a -dimensional lower triangular matrix and if , and holds, . Furthermore if , the matrix is called unit lower triangular.

For a -dimensional upper triangular matrix and if , and holds, . Furthermore if , the matrix is called unit upper triangular.

The default storage for triangular matrices is packed. Orientation and storage can also be specified. Default is row_major and and unbounded_array. It is not required by the storage to initialize elements of the matrix.

Template Parameters:
T the type of object stored in the matrix (like double, float, complex, etc...)
TRI the type of the triangular matrix. It can either be lower or upper. Default is lower
L the storage organization. It can be either row_major or column_major. Default is row_major
A the type of Storage array. Default is unbounded_array
